author: Paulo Coelho
review: This book inspires readers to follow their dreams and listen to their hearts. It delivers a simple yet powerful message about destiny, faith, and self-discovery.

author: James Clear
review: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones. The book focuses on small changes that create remarkable long-term results.

author: George Orwell
review: A dark and disturbing novel that explores surveillance, censorship, and loss of freedom. It forces readers to question power and control in society.

author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
review: This book changes the way people think about money and financial education. It highlights the importance of assets, investments, and financial independence.

author: Morgan Housel
review: An insightful book that explains how human behavior affects financial decisions. It focuses more on mindset than complex financial formulas.

author: J.K. Rowling
review: A magical story that introduces readers to the wizarding world. It is full of adventure, friendship, and imagination for all ages.
